data.title: MyHomeMatch®
data.body: MyHomeMatch® is an online residential real estate marketplace matching homebuyers with developers and mortgage lenders in Nigeria. It provides a solution for all stakeholders in the housing market through a database that is efficient, innovative and accessible, forming an essential suite of resources and guidance on finding your home. The main goal for the project was to create a clean and simple layout for a corporate brochure as part of the overall business materials.

data.title: The Poetry of Illusion
data.body: Design and art direction of the promotional material (poster, flyers and VOID page) for the documentary “The Poetry Of Illusion”.

data.title: MoMoWo - Women's creativity since the Modern Movement
data.body: Women’s creativity since the Modern Movement (MoMoWo) is a large-scale cooperation project co-funded by the Creative Europe Programme within the Culture sub-programme. The visual identity is based on the modernist furniture by french designer Charlotte Perriand, being primarily focused on clean geometric forms and a balanced visual composition. As Perriand’s pieces, the identity shows a modular and efficient graphic solution.

data.title: Le Pick Clops
data.body: We are renewed by what we forget. Le Pick Clops is film as an open, unmediated record of sixteen minutes at the café Le Pick Clops in Paris. The soundtrack to Le Pick Clops was written and recorded between September 2014 and January 2015 at Clouds Hill by The Poetry Of Illusion. It is a work of divination. An intimate companion to borderless space and limitless wonder. It is the luxurious depth of early seventies electronica by Tangerine Dream and Vangelis, the jazz fusion of Chick Corea and Joe Zawinul and the ambience of Susumu Yokota.

data.title: NGR Development Partners
data.body: Logo, stationery design, brand guidelines manual and business plan development for a residential real estate advisory and project management company providing services to public authorities, property owners, developers, lenders, investors and property funds. They have over 20 years combined management experience gained across a range of disciplines including financial analysis, property investment, PPPs, property development, and sourcing of property development finance.

data.title: Memory Babe
data.body: Memory Babe is rich symphonic rock rippling with melodic invention and deep beauty. This is an album that will remain an ongoing revelation, combining a truly progressive fusion of jazz, folk and rock with a lyrical depth that together reaches an almost mystical level of musical transcendence.

data.title: Ponto25 - Informatica
data.body: Ponto25 is a portuguese software company founded in 1997, which focuses on the development of management business solutions for various industries. The main objective was to redesign the full identity and create a modern and cohesive visual system for all their products (desktop/web software) and marketing communications. The identity was applied on different supports across print (stationery, brochures, intern documents, etc) and web (main website, cloud solutions, etc).

data.title: Quality Corporativo
data.body: Quality Electronics Corporativo S.A. is a corporate group from Mexico dedicated to construction, air conditioners sales and LED lighting. The catalog presents a modern layout containing information about their products and services. (A4 format | 304 pages).

data.title: SAK - Shop.Arch.Kids
data.body: Logo, stationery design and brand guidelines for an atelier of interior furniture and design products.

data.title: D.I.B Australia
data.body: Presentation book for a company of audio visual systems (216mm x 280mm | 96 pages).

data.title: Edison
data.body: Publication about Thomas Edison and the biggest technology debate that shaped the power industry, the War of the Currents, where Thomas and Nikola Tesla became adversaries due to Edison's promotion of direct current (DC) for electric power distribution over alternating current (AC). The editorial artefact has a contemporary and experimental layout where the information arrangement doesn't follow the usual rules and takes a rebellious approach. The artefact was printed on different paper sizes and assembled by saddle-stitched binding. FEATURED: Editorial Design Served (Behance).

data.title: Artaud's Cane
data.body: Signed to the legendary progressive rock label Musea in France, Glenn Thomson's first album for the label, Spidercraft UFO, was released in December 2012. An eclectic mix of progressive rock, jazz fusion and electronica, the album features a soaring cinematic architecture, anthemic songs and in the words of 2012's Grammy winner for mastering album of the year,

data.title: Ego
data.body: Editorial artefact about the Ego where the main object represents a mediatic publication about famous people from nowadays. All the personalities who were included in the publication are famous people from which we hear about on a daily basis from diferent areas. To contextualize the Ego issue, there are some suplements along the artefact that contain information about the Ego analyses by Freud and also by Erik Erikson. It is this publication‘s purpose to provide a contrast between the classic approaches to the Ego and the demonstration of itself in today’s society.

data.title: 2 Minutes
data.body: Publication created in an academic context (Editorial Design | Master's Degree), whose objective was based on the construction of a story as a way to promote creative thinking. The sequence presented represents a life-threatening situation in a seemingly ordinary scene.

data.title: Animalia
data.body: Experimental publication about a fictionalized narrative based on the exploration of various concepts and behaviors in a relationship between the human species and the irrational animals.
